refnamediv.refpurpose: Iteratively reduce the array to a single value using a callback function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
array
The input array.
callback
mixedcallback mixedcarry mixeditem
carry
Holds the return value of the previous iteration; in the case of the first iteration it instead holds the value of initial.
item
Holds the value of the current iteration.
initial
If the optional initial is available, it will be used at the beginning of the process, or as a final result in case the array is empty.
